author: Geir Moulson, Elena Becatoros
title: EASTER CRACKDOWN
description: BERLIN (AP) — As the Easter holiday approaches, world leaders and health officials are fervently warning that hard-won gains in the fight against the coronavirus must not be jeopardized by...
content:
BERLIN (AP) As the Easter holiday approaches, world leaders and health officials are fervently warning that hard-won gains in the fight against the coronavirus must not be jeopardized by relaxing social distancing.
A spike in deaths in Britain and New York a… [+6342 chars]
